attributes.action: abolish all taxes except income tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolishing all taxes except income tax (and obviously raising income tax to a level which would still generate the total tax required) would greatly simplify the tax system, make it fairer (as the higher earners pay more and the lower earners pay less) and save a fortune in collection costs.  (This is different to the 'Taxes-Abolition' ePetition which calls for the abolition of ALL taxes.)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
